author: GuernseyDonkey
title: Typical premier inn, perfect for short stay
text:
We stayed here for two nights in February. We arrived at London Bridge main line and followed the walking instructions from their web site. Perfect and spot on directions and took us about 10/15 minutes with luggage.
Check in was very quick, typed in our surname into the machine and our cards were printed.
Room was clean with coffee and tea making facilities. There is no safe.
The first night was so hot in the room, we had problems sleeping. We reported this and the second night it was cooler, but still very warm. The corridors were like an oven too.
Location wise there are loads of places to eat and drink all within a few minutes walk so we did not eat in their restaurant.
Check out was speedy and they let us store our cases for a few hours with a donation to a charity.
Will definitely return and would recommend, as long as they sort out the room and corridor temperatures.
